songs.title: Intimidated
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Uh, I see you over there
Don't be shy, come here

[Verse 1]
You got that thing that I can't deny
So move it over here, oh, yeah
You're giving signs that I recognize
Say what you want, oh, yeah

[Pre Chorus]
Baby, there's something about you
Show me that nothing can hold you down
Cause I, I must confess, I'm feeling you right now

[Chorus]
So baby take your chance and show your confidence
Oh baby, tell me who you are
You make my body scream
You make me believe
That you're what I'm waiting for
Don't you be intimidated

[Verse 2]
Just be a man, show me where you stand
Positivity, oh, yeah, oooh
Don't come off shy if you want me bad
And if my e-g-o shows, oh, no, don't give up too fast

[Pre Chorus]
Baby, there's something about you
Show me that nothing can hold you down
Cause I, I must confess, I'm feeling you right now

[Chorus]
So baby take your chance and show your confidence
Oh baby, tell me who you are
You make my body scream
You make me believe
That you're what I'm waiting for
Don't you be intimidated

B-R-I-T-N-E-Y
(Uh, come on)
B-R-I-T-N-E-Y

[Bridge]
It doesn't matter boo
As long as you're digging me
So much we can be (oooh)
Yes, it's true, at first you got to make the move
For me to see, what I want with you

[Chorus]
So baby take your chance (your chance)
And show your confidence
Oh baby, tell me who you are
You make my body scream
(You make my body scream)
You make me believe
That you're what I'm waiting for
And don't you be intimidated
So baby take your chance, and show your confidence
Oh baby, tell me who you are
You make my body scream
You make me believe
That you're what I'm waiting for
Don't you be intimidated
